00006 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.ListOfValue;
00007 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.SelectBoxViewable;
00008 
00013 public class SelectBoxViewer
00014 {
00022         public static String getHtmlCode(SelectBoxViewable entity,
00023                         String inputName, String inputValue, boolean isReadOnly)
00024 
00025         {
00026                 String html = "";
00027 
00028                 String getListLinkHtml = LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(new ActionLink(entity
00029                                 .getLabelName(), new BaseAction("GetList",
00030                                 ((ListOfValue) entity).getForeignEntityDefinition())));
00031 
00032                 if (getListLinkHtml.length() < 2)
00033                         getListLinkHtml = entity.getLabelName();
00034 
00035                 html += getListLinkHtml;
00036 
00037                 html += ": </td><td>";
00038 
00039                 NaturalMap<String, String> elements = entity.getElements();
00040 
00041                 if (isReadOnly)
00042                 {
00043                         if (inputValue == null || inputValue.equals("null")
00044                                         || inputValue.equals("0"))
00045                                 inputValue = "1";
00046 
00047                         if (elements.get(inputValue) != null)
00048                                 html += elements.get(inputValue);
00049                         html += "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"" + inputName
00050                                         + "\" value=\"" + inputValue + "\" />";
00051                 }
00052                 else
00053                 {
00054                         html += "<select name=\"" + inputName + "\">";
00055 
00056                         if (elements.get(inputValue) != null)
00057                                 html += "<option value=\"" + inputValue + "\">"
00058                                                 + elements.get(inputValue) + "</option>";
00059 
00060                         for (String elementKey : elements.getKeyList())
00061                         {
00062                                 if (!elementKey.equals(inputValue))
00063                                 {
00064                                         html += "<option value=\"" + elementKey + "\">"
00065                                                         + elements.get(elementKey) + "</option>";
00066                                 }
00067                         }
00068                         html += "</select>";
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 return html;
00072         }
00073 }
